comment.author: 54862197@N00
comment._content: Shame that it's out of focus. Otherwise it would be a great picture of a great president.

comment.author: 38098863@N05
comment._content: Woodrow Wilson was the twenty-eighth President of the United States.  He was one of the leading intellectuals during the progressive era.  His second term was in the heart of World War I.  His "idealist" and "realist" positions on foreign policy made him, according to some scholars, as one of the greatest presidents yet.  In this photo, he appears to be very stern and in front of a governmental building.

comment.author: 59109895@N07
comment._content: Not so much of a president
